Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
This class is used to a le to handle the buttons , view tablets where the order can be visualized.
Author:
Jhael Arce Chavez
